name: Muslims of Haas
description:
Muslims of Haas (MoH) is a dynamic business affinity group that aims to establish a vibrant network and community for undergraduate students, graduate students, and alums within the Haas School of Business who identify as Muslims. Our primary focus is to foster mentorship and facilitate job placement while actively advocating for the advancement and inclusion of Muslims in the business world.

 

At the core of our mission, Muslims of Haas is dedicated to meeting the unique needs of our community members within a business context. We provide a supportive environment that fosters professional and personal growth through tailored programs and initiatives. These include mentorship opportunities, career development workshops, industry panels, networking events, and entrepreneurial endeavors.

 

Our vision extends beyond fulfilling immediate needs. Muslims of Haas aims to cultivate a strong internal foundation that offers valuable resources to our members, empowering them to excel in their academic pursuits and future careers. In addition, we strive to establish enduring partnerships with university administration, industry leaders, and relevant organizations both on and off campus. By building these connections, we aspire to elevate the influence and recognition of Muslims of Haas as a respected and influential business group within the Haas School of Business and the broader business community.

 

We firmly believe in the power of collective ideas and contributions. Muslims of Haas actively encourages community members to share their insights and initiatives, fostering an environment of collaboration and innovation. We provide opportunities for individuals to lead central projects and delegate responsibilities to committees and community members based on their expertise and capacity. By engaging our members, we ensure that Muslims of Haas remains a dynamic and responsive organization, consistently providing valuable support and opportunities.

 

Serving on the Muslims of Haas board is an exceptional opportunity for driven community members to develop as business leaders. Board members will acquire invaluable skills in strategic planning, organizational management, effective communication, and entrepreneurial thinking. In addition, through their involvement, outstanding community members will gain firsthand experiences that will equip them to become influential leaders within the business world, championing the interests of Muslims and promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion in the business community.

 

Muslims of Haas is committed to fostering an inclusive and empowering environment for Muslims pursuing careers in business. We are dedicated to supporting our members' personal and professional growth, building a strong network, and advocating for positive change in the business world. Together, we strive to create a lasting impact within the Haas School of Business and beyond.
summary: Muslims of Haas (MoH) champions Muslim inclusion in business, focusing on mentorship, placement, and growth within Haas and beyond.
